power.title: Awaken the Slumbering Hurt
power.fluff: Your foes' wounds allow you to dodge at just the right angles to foil their attacks and when you attack, you focus on a single enemy's injuries and find the perfect place to strike

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes extra damage from your next attack equal to your Strength modifier. The attack must be made before the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move up to your speed. During this movement, bloodied enemies cannot trigger actions based on your movement.
